original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>成功行釜底抽薪之計，降低該據點各項發展度，影響錢糧生產！(<color=#bceea7>釜底抽薪 成功</color>)
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent someone to <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> to successfully draw a salary from the bottom of the tank, reduce the development of the base, and affect the production of money! (<color=#bceea7>「Sabotage」 succeeded</color>)
